name: MobileUp
description:
MobileUp specializes in design and development of technologically complex mobile apps. Including products for financial services, transport, mHealth, wearable devices, as well as applications with complicated business logic. 
Enters Top-5 of Russian mobile development companies according to main industry ratings. 
Our projects won at Webby Awards Winner, Google Material Design Contest, GOLD Prize at 44th CMA Awards, Forbes, Grand Prize at Boomerangs etc.
